summary: Switzerland  is a small country in Western Europe.
full_text: Alain Menu  is a Swiss racing driver who is currently working for Team BMR as a driving coach. He was one of the most successful touring car drivers of the 1990s, winning the prestigious British Touring Car Championship twice . He drove for Chevrolet in the World Touring Car Championship between 2005 and 2012 with a best finish of second in 2012.
title: Alain Menu
